title: Many Moons
description: Princess Lenore, ill of a surfeit of raspberry tarts, wants the moon. She must have it, she says, to be well again. The King consults his wise men… but the Lord High Chamberlain cannot get the moon. Neither can the Royal Wizard. Nor the Royal Mathematician. Only when the King. In despair, calls on his lowly but clever Jester is the problem solved…
author: James Thurber
